nodes.bodyText:
I did consider creating an abstract class that both Internal... and External... could extend from with this implementation. However, I feel like the code here happens to be the same as opposed to being the same. It could very well be that internal recordings are blocked for different reasons than external ones down the line.
Could totally understand if that seems wrong though!
I'm not sure we're likely to add conditions but the principle makes sense to me and there isn't much more complexity one way or the other.
